description: The resurrection of Jesus Christ is the cornerstone of Christian faith. Three days after His crucifixion and burial, Jesus rose bodily from the dead, conquering death and vindicating His claims to be the Son of God. The tomb was found empty, the grave clothes left behind, and Jesus appeared alive to numerous witnesses over forty daysâ€”to Mary Magdalene, to the disciples, to more than five hundred people at once.
name: Christian Cosmology
connections: Techiyat HaMetim - Resurrection of the dead
Valley of Dry Bones - Ezekiel 37 vision
Soul's Ascent - Rising to divine realm
